Class Raindrop

  • java.lang.Object
    • Raindrop

  • public class Raindrop
extends java.lang.Object
    Uses multiple instances of Rectangle to model a Raindrop. This class represents a Raindrop object. When combined with the GameArena class, instances of the Raindrop class can be displayed on the screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Raindrop

        public Raindrop(double x,
                double y,
                double w,
                double h,
                double yInc,
                GameArena arena)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        x - middle of raindrop on x-axis
        y - middle of raindrop on y-axis
        w - width of raindrop
        h - height of raindrop
        yInc - distance raindrop will fall
        arena - GameArea object for adding raindrop Rectangles

    • Method Detail

        Move the Raindrop Down
        Parameters:
        yMax - the maximum yPosition
        Returns:
        false if unable to move

      • touching

        public java.lang.Boolean touching(double x,
                                  double y,
                                  double w,
                                  double h)
        Checks whether Raindrop is touching another object
        Parameters:
        x - xposition of other object
        y - yposition of other object
        w - width of other object
        h - height of other object
        Returns:
        true if touching

      • destroy

        Destructor Removes raindrop from arena

        arena - GameArea object for removing raindrop Rectangles
